meanings.definition: A person or group responsible for planning and coordinating events or activities.
meanings.sent1: The organisers of the school play worked hard to make sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The event organisers set up the stage and decorations for the party.
meanings.sent3: The organisers decided to have a surprise guest at the meeting, causing excitement among the attendees.
meanings.sent4: The organisers of the charity event were the unsung heroes behind its success.
meanings.sent5: With the organisers' detailed planning, the concert was a huge hit with the audience.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used to arrange or store items in an orderly manner.
meanings.sent1: She used the organisers in her drawer to neatly store her stationery.
meanings.sent2: The closet organisers helped keep his clothes organized and easy to find.
meanings.sent3: The desk organisers kept all the pens and pencils in their designated spots.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen organisers made it convenient to access all the cooking utensils.
meanings.sent5: The bathroom organisers kept the toiletries neatly arranged on the shelf.
